mapper.insert: INSERT INTO posts(post_id, id, title, contents, post_time, hit_count) VALUES (#{post.postId}, #{post.id},#{post.title},#{post.contents},#{post.postTime},#{post.hitCount})
mapper.update: update posts set title = #{post.title} , contents = #{post.contents} where post_id =#{post.postId} and id =#{post.id}
